nodes.name: Librarian
nodes.text: Ready for a quiz? Let’s see what you’ve learned.

nodes.name: Librarian
nodes.text: Question 1: In which year was Universiti Malaya established?

nodes.name: Librarian
nodes.text: Correct! 1949 it is. Looks like someone paid attention in history class.

nodes.name: Librarian
nodes.text: Question 2: What is the name of UM’s iconic central library?

nodes.name: Librarian
nodes.text: Correct again! You must be a regular visitor. Or at least good at guessing.

nodes.name: Librarian
nodes.text: Question 3: What is UM’s official motto?

nodes.name: Librarian
nodes.text: Three correct answers in a row?

nodes.name: Librarian
nodes.text: Get prepare yourself first… We have lots of books here.

nodes.name: Librarian
nodes.text: And no, you can't borrow my glasses.

nodes.name: Librarian
nodes.text: One more wrong answer and I’m calling campus security.

nodes.name: Librarian
nodes.text: Just kidding. Maybe. Either way, you'll find the answers… eventually.

nodes.name: Librarian
nodes.text: At this point, even the monkeys from Rimba Ilmu know more than you.

nodes.name: Librarian
nodes.text: Brush up before they replace you.
